betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Breaking §2§2Leaves§f with an §2Crook §fwill increase the overall chance of their drops and allows to obtain an special item called §f§2Silkworm§f.

§2§fRight-Clicking §f§2Leaves§f with an §1§2Silkworm§f will turn them into §2Infested Leaves§f, wait till their "infestation" is done and break them with an §2Crook§f to obtain lots of §2String§f!
